document_data.name: Rugan
document_data.mainbody: '''Rugan''' was a transporter for a branch of the [[Zhentarim]] that operated on the [[Sword Coast]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: He was an unscrupulous individual who was more than willing to steal from his fellow Zhentarim.
document_data.Activities: Rugan operated out of the hidden Zhentarim outpost located in a cavern beneath the [[Waukeen's Rest]] inn.
document_data.Relationships: He recruited the younger [[Zarys]] and taught her the rules of the organization before she emerged as the leader of their group.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Rugan and his companions were tasked with transporting a strongbox containing some [[iron flask|unknown item]] to [[Baldur's Gate]] and delivering it to an unknown wealthy individual in the city. When traveling along the [[Risen Road]] near [[Moonhaven]], Rugan and his men were attacked by a band of savage [[gnoll]]s and forced to take refuge within a nearby cave and fight for their lives.
